extendedInfo.description: "Hashtags and to do lists â together at last"-TheVergeFetchnotes makes productivity as easy as writing a tweet. It's a unique cross between note-taking and to do listing that helps you forget less, do more and feel in control.Just add # in front of any word to create a category on the fly. Put @ in front of a username to send it to that person. Don't be boxed in by complex tools you'll never use. Just dump things down the way you think:#music, #gifts, #watch, #read, #ideas, #groceries, #beer, #quotes, #emailFetchnotes: your mind's best friend.â Absolutely freeâ Easy to organize, easy to shareâ Access on ANY deviceâ Add notes via SMS, email and voiceTry it out for yourself! Here's what people have been saying:"Fetchnotes wants to shake things up a bit"- Lifehacker"the API to your brain" - the WSJ"Definitely a different way to think about note-taking" - TechCrunch"Fetchnotes makes your important content available no matter where you are and no matter what device youâre using" - TheNextWeb"#Brilliant" - Netted"The Easiest Reminder Service You'll Ever Use" - ReadWriteWeb

reviews.title: Overall works well but...
reviews.comment: Please make the note editing area use as much screen as possible. On my nexus 7 about 50% of the screen space is just blank wasted space when typing! Other than that everything works well
reviews.author: Samuel Cox

reviews.title: Can\'t even sign up
reviews.comment: I spent almost an hour trying different user names but all of them seem to be taken I even tried impossible combinations with my names but still can\'t work.
reviews.author: Tamer Mehyar

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: its cross platformed so me and my girlfriend can both use it apple to Droid.
reviews.author: michael james

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t let me register an account...
reviews.comment: ... even tried different email addresses. Disappointed
reviews.author: Billy Rigas

reviews.title: Dumb!!!
reviews.comment: I spent 15 minutes and a ton of usernames and could not sign up.  Waste of time!!!
reviews.author: Lacey respalie

reviews.comment: Super productivity app.  Makes me a better person.
reviews.author: Dan Von Kohorn

reviews.title: Use it daily
reviews.comment: This is a very useful app. I can share lists with friends, sync web and phone lists. I mainly use it to keep grocery, to do and frequently needed address listed accessible. Would recommend it to anyone!
reviews.author: neha sarode

reviews.title: I don\'t want my private notes online
reviews.comment: Seems like more of a business app.
reviews.author: ModernRock Bro

reviews.title: This is not iPhone
reviews.comment: This is Android and we deserve a better app than some iPhone app clone. Good concept though.
reviews.author: Daniel Voyles

reviews.title: Loving it. Need to add app widget
reviews.comment: Love the dog, maybe get him a bone.
reviews.author: Carol Fox

reviews.title: Username...
reviews.comment: Apparently every possible combo of my name is in use.. not cool
reviews.author: Ryan Wichers

reviews.title: Simple and Useful!
reviews.comment: Very much like the \"Twitter-esque\" idea of using tags and hashtags to categorize what to do and who to do things with. Makes it fun to use. One modification I\'d suggest to get an excellent rating from me would be to make a widget for more immediate access, since I happen to be forgetful or lazy with checking/logging into all of my apps sometimes. Otherwise, highly recommended, especially for students! :)
reviews.author: Marcela Colmenares

reviews.title: Ok, but could be better
reviews.comment: My first impressions (might update these on further use):  The hit area on the \"add\" button is minimal (6mm) when it should be 8mm or even a bit bigger. I\'m sometimes having to stab twice.   Oddly buggy: I swiped somewhere and just got a blank screen. Now none of my notes show no matter what I do. Hm. Had to clear the app data to get back again (and now I forgot my password). I also sometimes get a loading screen on start (bit of a disaster for a notes app!) but other times not.  Why do I need a login and password? When deleting notes, I want an undo, not an \"are you sure\" because 99% of the time I\'m sure. Idea (which might not be any good): try putting the \"add\" button on a movable tab on the left side of the screen. This is because a) its existing position is awkward for such an important function and my thumb is on the other side, and b) new phones have crazy tall screens that mean you have to stretch to hit a top left (or even top right) button. Allow me to position it vertically so I can easily hit it.
reviews.author: Jonathan Baker-Bates

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: I love your sense of humor (read your blog). Just started using this app today. Hopefully it will help me remember what exactly I\'m supposed to accomplish at any given moment! ;
reviews.author: Rosemarie Taylor

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Awesome app! And huge thanks to the Dev team for fixing the compatability issues for my samsung moment m900 android 2.1-1. Newer app is much faster yeay works as I like!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its a great app!! I real like it!!
reviews.comment: Update: it\'s fast too!!.. Congrats devs!.. End of update.  Its a great app!! I real like it!! congrats to the team for creating such a lightweight notetaking app!  WHY I CHOSE THIS over evernote(too heavy,requires pro feature even for basic facilities) and catchnotes(complicated UI) :  1: simple UI (like dropbox!) 2: great feedback section 3: uses python(if my research is right)...I\'ve seen apps that use python as main lang to really excel in quality...for instance dropbox,youtube,pinterset,etc
reviews.author: anish d

reviews.title: It\'ll do
reviews.comment: Not the best app you\'ll ever use, but at least you can share to do lists, grocery lists, etc between android & ios devices/users.
reviews.author: Terry Phillips
